artist: Manufacturer: Minton, Hollins & Co., Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire, England
description: blue glaze; tondo containing scene of bare chested woman with flowing draperies seated on a rock, holdinga sicle in her PR hand and a torch in her PL hand; urns with ribbons in corners; "AESTAS" at center bottom
markings: on bottom, in relief: [MINTON / HOLLINS / & CO / PATENT / TILE / WORKS / STOKE ON / TRENT] and [145]
title: Aestas
